chris.paterson@resimac.com.au.news: Resimac is currently experiencing technical issues with their phone system and advising customers to email for urgent enquiries. They are also reviewing their variable interest rates following the RBA cash rate decision. An update on this will be sent to customers via post. As of 20th June 2023, Resimac has changed the interest rates on their variable rate home loans. They have also introduced CustomerZone, a new online loan management platform with multiple features and benefits.
chris.paterson@resimac.com.au.notable_details: Resimac Group is a leading alternative lender for residential mortgages and asset finance in Australia and New Zealand. They have issued over $45 billion of mortgage-backed securities in domestic and global markets since 1987 and have a portfolio of home loans on balance sheet of over $13 billion. They also have a distribution network of over 85% of mortgage brokers in Australia.
